MarkdownBlockBase.code_block: ms.assetid: 949D1CE0-DD7D-420E-904D-758FADEBE85A title: Enable device capabilities description: This tutorial describes how to declare device capabilities in Microsoft Visual Studio. This enables your app to use cameras, microphones, location sensors, and other devices.
